General.Name: Sersol Bhd
General.Description: Sersol Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells coatings, thinners, industrial chemicals, paints, chemical solvents, and aluminum and metal products in Malaysia and Thailand. It operates through two segments, Plastic and Metal Coatings, and Decorative Coatings. The company trades in architectural coatings and wall surface finishing materials; distributes and trades in medical goods or devices; and distributes coating paints, as well as operates as a painting service contractor. It is also involved in the provision of management services. The company was formerly known as SerSol Technologies Berhad. Sersol Berhad was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Ulu Tiram, Malaysia.
